text: Leopoldo Ramón Pedro Calvo-Sotelo y Bustelo, 1st Marquis of the Ría of Ribadeo, Grandee of Spain (; 14 April 1926 – 3 May 2008) was a Spanish politician. He was the prime minister during the end of Francisco Franco's dictatorship in Spain. He died of cardiac arrest at his home in Pozuelo de Alarcón, Madrid, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1926 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Prime Ministers of Spain Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: Leopoldo Calvo-Sotelo
